name: V-Hunter Puzzler Dx
description:
Help V-Hunter clear out a wide assortment of monsters in this dynamic turn-based grid puzzler! Tackle over 60 bite-sized levels in 5 different environments. Defeat 15 different enemy types using unique items such as Holy Water, Guns, and Dynamite to help you in your quest!

V-Hunter Puzzler Dx is a shorter experience. A single playthrough is estimated to take between 1-2 hours.

Dynamite! (and other items)

  • Obliterate Mummies with Dynamite!
  • Use 5 other items, such as a Revolver to shoot from afar and Holy Water to damage Vampires!

Tons of Enemies

  • 15 enemies with unique behavior
  • Slay Rats, Skeletons, Mummies, Demons, and more!
  • Boss fights too!

Bite Sized Levels

  • Over 60 levels
  • Each is designed to offer a challenge in just a few minutes

Unlockable Costumes

  • Complete achievements to unlock 6 unique costumes
  • Including Classic V, Jungle Fighter V, Reaper V, and more!
